1.「……そのカラクリに| 気づかないとでも思ったか？: ...Did you think I wouldn't notice that trick?

3.「うるさいコバエは ここで 始末させてもらう！: I'll take care of the noisy flies right here!

6.「エルトナに吹く風よ……| いにしえより 世界樹を守る精霊たちよ……: O winds that blow in Eltona, spirits that have|guarded the Yggdrasil since time immemorial.

|monster.

It has been a long time. I have|heard about the series of events that have|been taking place in various parts of Astoltia|
|in recent days.

20.「そなたに 話しておきたいことがあるのです。| どうか ツスクルの村の巫女の館ま: I have something to tell you. Please come to|the Maiden Manor in Tsusukul Village. I will|be waiting for you.

21.「よく来てくれましたね <pc>。| そなたの活躍は 風の便りで聞いております。: Welcome <pc>. I have heard of your|success through the wind.

22.「大魔王が倒され 平和の訪れし今……| この エルトナの地にも| 大きな時代の転:
Now that the Great Demon King has been|defeated and peace has come to the land of|Eltona, a great turning point of time has|
|come.

23.「…………まもなく 世界樹の花が咲きます。: ...Soon Yggdrasil Flower will be in bloom.

24.「世界樹の守り人たる私には| かの大樹の息吹から 葉のざわめきから……| はっき: As the guardian of the Yggdrasil, I know it|clearly from the breath of the tree and the|rustle of its leaves.

25.「そして それを祝う 花開きの聖祭が | ここ ツスクルの村で 始まろうとしてい: And to celebrate, the Holy Festival of the|Opening of the Flowers is about to begin here|in Tsusukul Village.

26.「エルトナの民にとって 花開きの聖祭は| 数百年に一度だけ起こる 奇跡の再現。|:
For the Eltona people, the Holy Festival of|Flower Opening is a recreation of a miracle|that occurs only once every few hundred years.|
|Brings people from all over the continent.

27.「そんな 大切な時に 世界樹の丘に| 悪しき者が現れた……。| 私は 不吉な予感: At such an important time, an evil person|appeared on Yggdrasil Hill... I can't help but|have an ominous feeling.

28.「<pc>よ。どうか| そなたの チカラを 貸してください。| 世界樹にまつわる: O <pc>. We ask that you lend us your|power. To protect all the people associated|with Yggdrasil.

29.「それは あの悪しき者を追うという| そなたの目的にも かなうことでしょう。: It will serve your purpose in pursuing the|evil one.

39.「彼女も 学びの庭で学んだのですよ。| とても利発で あなたに似て優しい子でした: She, too, learned in the Garden of Learning.|She was very clever and kind like you.

40.「聖祭を成しとげることこそは 私のよろこび。| 世界樹の花は エルトナの民にとっ: It is my joy to celebrate the feast. The|Yggdrasil Flower is the wind of hope for the|people of Eltona.

41.「そして そなたは 新たな風の象徴です。| だからこそ 聖祭の祭司を務める私の|:
And you are the symbol of the new wind. That's|why I ask you to be my ministers in the|celebration of the Holy Feast of the Blessed|
|Sacrament.

43.「感謝します フウラ。 | 介添え役のそなたには 聖なる水差しを| 手に入れてき: Thank you, Fuura. You, my bridesmaid, must go|and receive the Holy Jug.

44.「しかし……ひとつ 気がかりなことが。| 悪しき者が ツスクルに現れ| エルフの: But...there is one thing that concerns me. It|seems that evil men have appeared in Tsusukul|and are after the holy ones of the Elf.

45.「風乗りである そなたも| 用心せねばなりません……。: You, the wind rider, must be careful...

117.「聖なる水差しに 天の水を満たしました。| これより 御手を清めさせていただきま: I have filled the Holy Jug with heavenly|water. I will now purify Your hands.

121.「……振り返れば なにもかも いとおしい。: Looking back, everything is dear to me.

176.「神の器とは……？: What is a vessel of God...?

177.「幼き頃 母より聞いたことがあります。| 六種族を司る 六柱の神々からの| 特別: When I was a child, my mother told me that|there was a child born with special blessings|from the six gods that govern the six races.

178.「その子は 神の器と呼ばれ| 種族の神との 魂の結びつきを持つとか。: The child would be called the "vessel of God"|and have a soul connection with the god of|their race.

179.「ま まさか……エルフの神 エルドナ神の器が| 我が娘 フウラであったと？: You don't think... that the vessel of the Elf|god Eldona was my daughter Fuura?

180.「おそらく そういうことなのでしょう。| 不思議な宿命を 背負った子です。: Perhaps that is how it is. He is a child with|a mysterious destiny.

181.「すでに さらわれた他種族の者たちも| それぞれの神の 加護を受けた| 神の器だ: It means that those of other species who have|already been kidnapped were also divine|vessels blessed by their respective deities.

182.「風に 耳を澄ませてみましょう……。| かの者の行方を 明かしてくれるよう。: Let us listen to the wind that it may reveal|to us the whereabouts of the one.

183.「オーグリード大陸……ランガーオ村。| そこに 悪しき者が向かっているようです。: Ogreed Continent...Langao Village. It appears|that the bad guys are on their way there.

185.「そなたには 苦労をかけますね。| 今回のことの感謝の意も込めて 心ばかりですが:
I am sorry for the trouble I have put you|through. As a token of my appreciation for|what you've done for me, please use this to|
|help you on your journey.

186.「我らも カミハルムイより 兵を出し| あのフードのならず者の 捜索に当たらせよ: We, too, will send out a force from Kamiharmui|to search for that hooded rogue.

187.「わわ 私も オーグリードへと向かい| フウラの行方を……: Wow, I, too, would like to head to Ogreed and|see if I can find Fuura...

189.「これは 我々の知る世界の 外にある戦いです。 | 下手に手を出せば いたずらに: This is a battle outside the world as we know|it. If we stay out of it, we'll be adding to|the casualties.

190.「<pc>……そなたは この戦いに| 深い宿縁で 結ばれているようです。: <pc>...you seem to be bound by a deep|karma to this battle.

191.「これは そなたにしか できぬこと。| どうか フウラを頼みます。: This is something only you can do. Please take|care of Fuura.
